returnType.description: Brand if BIN is valid, undefined if BIN is not valid
returnType.name: brand

returnType.description: The brand input is included in allowedBrands
returnType.name: brandValid

returnType.description: Raw input value state sent from onCardNumberChange
returnType.name: cardNumberInputValue

returnType.description: Card validator from BIN if BIN is matched, undefined if BIN not recognized
returnType.name: cardValidator

returnType.description: cardNumberInputValue with non digit values filtered out, and/or max characters removed
returnType.name: cleanCardNumber

returnType.description: Valid last digit based off mod 10 check
returnType.name: lastDigitValid

returnType.description: The card number length is valid, validated with cleanCardNumber
returnType.name: lengthValid

returnType.description: The card number is fully valid based on BIN regex's, allowed brands, length, and modulo 10 check
returnType.name: valid

disclaimer: This hook's validation is not comprehensive and is subject to change. VPDS does not maintain acceptance marks for all brands for legal reasons. This hook is designed to let you bring your own validators, if custom validators are required for your use case.
devNote: This validator array is not comprehensive and is subject to change. VPDS does not maintain acceptance marks for all brands for legal reasons.
